===Arguments that U.S. foreign policy is effective===
===Arguments that U.S. foreign policy is effective===
â
[[File:WW2 Iwo Jima flag raising.jpg|thumb|right|alt=Black and white picture of soldiers on a mountaintop raising an American flag.|The U.S. won important wars such as [[World War II]]. Three of the six soldiers hoisting this flag over [[Iwo Jima]] died during subsequent fighting. But proponents claim U.S. foreign policy was effective at preventing subsequent world wars.]]
 
* '''United States is healthy and prosperous.''' Historian [[Niall Ferguson]] in ''[[The Ascent of Money]]'' argues it's "far too early to write off the United States" and notes many instances in which business rebounded after serious financial crises.<ref name=tws21dec116sfvvf>{{cite news
